name: HitBasedTrkg::HBHits
info: reconstructed hits using DC wire positions

entries.name: trkDoca
entries.info: track doca of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: docaError
entries.info: error on track doca of the hit

entries.name: LocX
entries.info: x in planar local coordinate system

entries.name: LocY
entries.info: y in planar local coordinate system

entries.name: B
entries.info: B-field intensity at hit position in tilted-sector system

name: TimeBasedTrkg::TBHits
info: reconstructed hits using DC timing information

entries.name: doca
entries.info: doca of the hit calculated from TDC (in cm)

entries.info: uncertainty on doca of the hit calculated from TDC (in cm)

entries.info: track doca of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: timeResidual
entries.info: time residual of the hit (in cm)

entries.name: fitResidual
entries.info: fit residual of the hit (in cm, from KF)

entries.name: B
entries.info: B-field intensity at hit position in tilted-sector system

entries.name: tBeta
entries.info: beta-dependent time correction used in tracking
